properties.name: --border-color
properties.description: The card's border color, including borders that occur inside the card.

properties.name: --border-radius
properties.description: The border radius for the card's edges.

properties.name: --border-width
properties.description: The width of the card's borders.

properties.name: --padding
properties.description: The padding to use for the card's sections.

pseudoElements.name: ::part(image)
pseudoElements.description: The container that wraps the card's image.

pseudoElements.name: ::part(header)
pseudoElements.description: The container that wraps the card's header.

pseudoElements.name: ::part(body)
pseudoElements.description: The container that wraps the card's main content.

pseudoElements.name: ::part(footer)
pseudoElements.description: The container that wraps the card's footer.
